column4: wow 1250 people?!?!? that's the lowest I've seen this channel in years
is there a version of streamtuner that is for video streams?
thats a bit complicated for ubuntu users!
do you think i should go to #linux?
what app are you trying to stream with?

Hi. I would just like to know if there is a way to setup several streaming media links (streaming live 24/7 like http://www.nasa.gov/multimedia/nasatv/index.html). I'd like to set up several of them so I can flip through them with a remote control. I'm using Ubuntu 10.04
what app are you trying to stream with?
im not trying to stream with any app. I'm trying to find out what i need to do to accomplish what i want. If that means using an "app to stream" then please let me know what the appropriate one is.
several streaming media links   probaly needs a setreming server AFAIK
several streaming media links   probaly needs a streaming* server AFAIK
what's that? and where can i find them?
your in the wrong place   try #videolan for some ideas
please don't tell me "you're in the wrong place"
well you are if its streaming info your looking for :P
